positions.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
positions.description: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to build and maintain our fintech platforms.
requirements: Strong experience with React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Experience in fintech or banking domain preferred

positions.title: Product Manager - Digital Banking
positions.description: Lead the development and strategy of our digital banking solutions.
requirements: Strong understanding of banking and fintech products
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
positions.description: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
requirements: Strong experience with Kubernetes and Docker

positions.title: Senior Business Analyst
positions.description: Work with clients to understand requirements and design fintech solutions.
requirements: Experience in banking or fintech domain
Experience with requirement gathering and analysis

positions.title: UI/UX Designer
positions.description: Design beautiful and intuitive user experiences for our fintech products.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Understanding of design systems and patterns

positions.title: QA Automation Engineer
positions.description: Build and maintain automated testing frameworks for our platforms.
requirements: Experience with test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress)
Strong programming skills (Java, Python, or JavaScript)
